elements.name: p-avatar
elements.description:
The Avatar component is used to represent user, and displays the profile picture, initials or fallback icon.
---


### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--avatar-background-color** - Controls the color of the avatar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--avatar-size** - Controls the size of the avatar. _(default: undefined)_
- **--avatar-text-color** - Controls the color of the text inside the avatar. _(default: undefined)_

elements.name: p-badge
elements.description:
The badge component is used to display a small amount of information to the user.
---


### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--badge-color** - Controls the color of the badge. _(default: undefined)_

elements.name: p-icon
elements.description:
Icons are visual symbols used to represent ideas, objects, or actions.
---


### **Events:**
 - **icon-error**

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--icon-color** - Controls the color of the icon. _(default: undefined)_
- **--icon-size** - Controls the size of the icon. Defaults to "1rem" _(default: 1rem)_

properties.name: --avatar-background-color
properties.description: Controls the color of the avatar.

properties.name: --avatar-size
properties.description: Controls the size of the avatar.

properties.name: --avatar-text-color
properties.description: Controls the color of the text inside the avatar.

properties.name: --badge-color
properties.description: Controls the color of the badge.

properties.name: --icon-color
properties.description: Controls the color of the icon.

properties.name: --icon-size
properties.description: Controls the size of the icon. Defaults to "1rem"
